Hi Scott,                    We have 4,000 metric tons of steel rebar from Duisburg to Omdurman. Do you have the capacity to move this in the next couple weeks?                    Thank you,                    Judith
Email 2:
Yes, Judith we have 10,000 tons of steel rebar for import. It is going from Budapest to El Dorado Hills, California. It is expected to arrive on 9/26/18 at Oakland, CA by ship.  Do you want the rail portion to go through:
Train 1015101 (Westbound)
Train 5117001 (Eastbound)
Train 2022012 (Westbound)
Train 5159001 (Eastbound)
Do you want to collect at:
Calinland Terminal
Door 85, Roll-on/roll-off
35th Street & 2nd Avenue
Oakland, CA 94607
David
Email 3:
We are looking at 100 containers which has 5,000 tons of steel rebar.  Please confirm the availability as mentioned above.                            Thanks,                            David

            ---
